{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Rakara |image = Portrait Rakara Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Rakara.png |caption = |race = Aumaua |subrace = Island |gender = Female |culture = [Rauatai](/rauatai/) |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = |level = 2 |MIG = 12 |CON = 11 |DEX = 10 |PER = 10 |INT = 10 |RES = 10 |health = 2 |damage = 5-8 {{crush}} / 5-8 {{crush}} |accuracy = 12 / 12 |penetration = 7 / 7 |deflection = 12 |fortitude = 18 |reflex = 12 |will = 12 |dr = 3 |ability = [Among the Waves](/amongTheWaves/) |location = [The Gullet](/theGullet/) |quests = [Food for Thought](/foodForThought/)
[Delver's Row](/delversRow/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Roparu Clothing |internalname = NPC_SD_Townie_Roparu_F_03 |guid = 835156e2-0960-4f4b-bff7-211ea1ac62a4 }} '''Rakara''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|A gaunt Roparu woman grabs for your leg. She paws at you with a weak grip, fingers bone-thin and trembling.}} A gaunt aumaua woman with irises as green as the sea. Known only as "Beggar", Rakara is one of many nameless Roparu who suffer in silence beneath the heels of the Mataru of [Huana](/huana/). She is on the verge of starvation, reduced to begging for scraps in the streets of the Gullet. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [Food for Thought](/foodForThought/)
[Delver's Row](/delversRowQuest/) |none = |other = * You can talk to her to learn that [Enoi](/enoi/) is the informal leader of the Roparu in the Gullet. * You are presented with a number of options, some of which are only available once: ** Crouch down to ask her name. ** Give her {{cp2|5}} for something to eat (Minor Positive reputation with [The Gullet](/theGullet/)), though she returns your coin to you. ** Give her some food ([Glazed Chops](/glazedChops/), [Shark Meat](/sharkMeat/), [Pork](/pork/), [Forbidden Flesh Pie](/forbiddenFleshPie/), [Hardtack](/hardtack/), [Rice](/rice/), or [Koīki Fruit](/koikiFruit/)) ([Benevolent](/benevolent/), Minor Positive reputation with [The Gullet](/theGullet/)) to keep her from dying. She dies if you talk to her again without giving her food. ** Kick her ([Cruel](/cruel/), Major Negative reputation with [The Gullet](/theGullet/)) }} ## =Quests = * [Food for Thought](/foodForThought/): She is among the roparu you are helping during the course of the quest. * [Delver's Row](/delversRowQuest/): You can ask her how you might get to Delver's Row. She points you towards [Enoi](/enoi/), and [Fyrna](/fyrna/) (only if you gave her food). ## Behind the scenes * The game has an incorrect portrait set for Rakara, using a red-eyed aumaua instead. ## Gallery Portrait Seinu Convo.png | Portrait shown in-game [Category:The Gullet characters](/categoryTheGulletCharacters/)

{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Rakara |image = Portrait Rakara Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Rakara.png |caption = |race = Aumaua |subrace = Island |gender = Female |culture = [[Rauatai]] |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = |level = 2 |MIG = 12 |CON = 11 |DEX = 10 |PER = 10 |INT = 10 |RES = 10 |health = 2 |damage = 5-8 {{crush}} / 5-8 {{crush}} |accuracy = 12 / 12 |penetration = 7 / 7 |deflection = 12 |fortitude = 18 |reflex = 12 |will = 12 |dr = 3 |ability = [[Among the Waves]] |location = [[The Gullet]] |quests = [[Food for Thought]]
[[Delver's Row]] |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |body = Roparu Clothing |internalname = NPC_SD_Townie_Roparu_F_03 |guid = 835156e2-0960-4f4b-bff7-211ea1ac62a4 }} '''Rakara''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== {{Description|A gaunt Roparu woman grabs for your leg. She paws at you with a weak grip, fingers bone-thin and trembling.}} A gaunt aumaua woman with irises as green as the sea. Known only as "Beggar", Rakara is one of many nameless Roparu who suffer in silence beneath the heels of the Mataru of [[Huana]]. She is on the verge of starvation, reduced to begging for scraps in the streets of the Gullet. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [[Food for Thought]]
[[Delver's Row (quest)|Delver's Row]] |none = |other = * You can talk to her to learn that [[Enoi]] is the informal leader of the Roparu in the Gullet. * You are presented with a number of options, some of which are only available once: ** Crouch down to ask her name. ** Give her {{cp2|5}} for something to eat (Minor Positive reputation with [[The Gullet]]), though she returns your coin to you. ** Give her some food ([[Glazed Chops]], [[Shark Meat]], [[Pork]], [[Forbidden Flesh Pie]], [[Hardtack]], [[Rice]], or [[Koīki Fruit]]) ([[Benevolent]], Minor Positive reputation with [[The Gullet]]) to keep her from dying. She dies if you talk to her again without giving her food. ** Kick her ([[Cruel]], Major Negative reputation with [[The Gullet]]) }} ===Quests=== * [[Food for Thought]]: She is among the roparu you are helping during the course of the quest. * [[Delver's Row (quest)|Delver's Row]]: You can ask her how you might get to Delver's Row. She points you towards [[Enoi]], and [[Fyrna]] (only if you gave her food). ==Behind the scenes== * The game has an incorrect portrait set for Rakara, using a red-eyed aumaua instead. ==Gallery== Portrait Seinu Convo.png | Portrait shown in-game [[Category:The Gullet characters]]
title: Rakara
